channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Kaohsiung Hospital Fined for Operating on Wrong Patient
item.description: A Kaohsiung hospital has been fined and at least five medical personnel have been fired or received demerits after performing surgery on the wrong patient.

item.title: Chinese National Investigated for Fraudulently Selling Taiwan Passports Abroad
item.description: A Chinese woman living in Taiwan is under investigation for heading a fraud operation, selling Taiwanese passports to Chinese citizens for use abroad.

item.title: Taiwan's Shipments to U.S. Surpass Those to China
item.description: The U.S. is now Taiwan's largest export market, overtaking China for the first time since 2003. The countryâ€™s shipments to the U.S. rose 65.7% to US$9.1 billion in March compared t

item.title: More Home Buyers Prefer Single-Room Apartments
item.description: A growing number of homebuyers in Taiwan are in the market for one-room apartments, a trend driven by high prices and people having fewer children.
